record.field.name: range.weight
record.file.name: validity

brief.brief: The weight of the range for risk calculation.
Range weights normally fall between 1 and 5.
Service Manager uses this field in conjunction with the weight.factor field during Change Management processing.

detail.detail: Service Manager determines the Risk Value of each range by range.weight * weight.factor.
The results of each range's Risk Value are averaged (total risk value/total number of fields) and rounded to the nearest whole number.
Service Manager passes this value back to the calling application (normally Change Management).
